Mon, 21 Oct 2024 03:00:00 +0000 Wayne Wright and the late Chloe Wright founded Kidicorp in 1996, then in 2015 sold the childcare giant to their own charity the Wright Family Foundation. Paying off this purchase saw their family trust receive $37m in tax-free earning last year. Photo / Norrie Montgomery
